channel.title: Player Clipping! (Following a player and going through objects) HELP! Will Rep++
channel.description:
I've looked many places and can't seem to find a tutorial that can fix my problem.
I need to fix my server (but I heard the problem was client sided?) so players can't follow each other and walk through objects like walls etc.
If someone could help me out on this it would be tremendously appreciated and you will receive a rep++ in return and added into the ::credit command on my server.
[b]EDIT:[/b] I'm using 317 DELTA Edge4Pk Source
